function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Involving a large number of individuals in the decision-making process may increase the risk of exposure to contagious diseases, especially during in-person meetings or consultations.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among the participants, leading to illness and potential transmission to others.","Mitigation":"Utilize virtual meetings and consultations to reduce the need for in-person gatherings, implement strict hygiene protocols for in-person meetings, and prioritize individual health screenings for participants.","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, teleconferencing tools, health screening technology, and remote collaboration software.","People":"50 participants from the construction and built environment sectors.","Owner":"Organizers of the meetings, technology providers, and health professionals."},{"Description":"Use of Likert rating system involving 25 participants may increase the risk of exposure to contagious diseases if gathering in person.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among the participants during the rating process, leading to illness and potential transmission to others.","Mitigation":"Utilize virtual rating systems, implement strict hygiene protocols for in-person gatherings, and prioritize individual health screenings for participants.","Technologies":"Virtual rating platforms, health screening technology, remote collaboration software, and teleconferencing tools.","People":"25 participants specific to their sector.","Owner":"Organizers of the rating process, technology providers, and health professionals."}]}
